#at ksdk directory
cp -r platform/CMSIS/Include/* /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/

find platform/drivers/ -name "system_MK60F12.h" -exec cp {} /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/drivers/ -name "system_MK60F12.c" -exec cp {} /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

rm /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/system_MK60F15.c

rm /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/system_MK60F15.h 













find platform/hal/ -maxdepth 2 -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/drivers/ -maxdepth 2 -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/hal/ -maxdepth 2 -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

find platform/drivers/ -maxdepth 2 -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;




Removed:

fsl_dspi_hal.c
fsl_dspi_irq.c
fsl_edma_hal.c
fsl_edma_irq.c
